description:
At last, the secret of the App Drives comes out! The one who called to Haru from the App Drive turns out to be a very unexpected person! And where does a certain picture lead them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Toki"o Koeta Message: Appli Drive no Shinjitsu
A Message from Across `Time!` The Truth of the App Drives!
『トキ』を超えたメッセージ アプリドライヴの真実
